thread.title: NOPD: Man points gun at cab driver, steals $15
thread.title_full: NOPD: Man points gun at cab driver, steals $15 - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: NOPD: Man points gun at cab driver, steals $15
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - A cab driver was robbed by an armed man he picked up near Mid-City.
The driver picked up two men in the 2400 block of Tulane Avenue around 11:11 p.m. on Wednesday. When they arrived at the destination, one of the men put a gun to the back of the 33-year-old victim's head and demanded money, according to an initial report from New Orleans police.
The driver, who works for Glen's Cab Company, gave the perpetrators $15. They escaped on foot.
Police did not release a description of the gunman or the other passenger.
Citizens with information about this crime are asked to call Crimestoppers at 822-1111 or toll-free 1-877-903-STOP(7867) or Text your crime tip to C-R-I-M-E-S (274637), Text TELLCS then your crime information. You could receive a cash reward of up to $2,500 for information leading to the arrest and indictment of the person(s) responsible. You do not have to give your name nor testify to receive the reward. Citizens can also submit an anonymous tip online to Crimestoppers at www.crimestoppersgno.org .
